bilingual.source: She is fully aware of the risks involved.
bilingual.target: 她完全地意识到了所涉及的风险。

bilingual.source: It's important not to hyp the risks involved.
bilingual.target: 重要的是不要夸张所涉及的风险。

bilingual.source: Thirdly, we should evaluate the risks involved.
bilingual.target: 第三，我们应该评估所涉及的风险。

bilingual.source: Fourthly, we should evaluate the risks involved.
bilingual.target: 第四地，我们应该评估所涉及的风险。

bilingual.source: He doesn't reck the risks involved in his actions.
bilingual.target: 他不顾虑他行为中涉及的风险。

bilingual.source: The risk involved in the investment is calculable.
bilingual.target: 投资中涉及的风险是可计算的。

bilingual.source: He enjoys the physical labor involved in gardening.
bilingual.target: 他喜欢园艺中涉及的体力劳动。

bilingual.source: The report emphasise the risks involved in the project.
bilingual.target: 报告强调了项目中涉及的风险。

bilingual.source: Before staking, make sure to understand the risks involved.
bilingual.target: 在抵押之前，请确保了解所涉及的风险。

bilingual.source: This incident underlines the risks involved in the project.
bilingual.target: 这一事件强调了项目中涉及的风险。

yingyinNormal.en: And you want me to get involved?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想要把我扯进来?

yingyinNormal.en: I love that we're getting involved.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很高兴我们能参与进来。

yingyinNormal.en: You will be involved? It depends what you need.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会帮忙吗？要看你需要我做什么了。

yingyinNormal.en: The balance of which involved spying over her back fence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们偷偷溜去她家后院。

yingyinNormal.en: You want to tell me what you got me involved in?
yingyinNormal.zh: 能告诉我你究竟把我搅进什么事儿里了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Carol says she and Susan want me to be involved. But if I'm not comfortable with it, I don't have to be involved.
yingyinNormal.zh: 卡萝说她和苏珊想让我加入，但是如果我对这件事感到不舒服，我也不必参与进去。

yingyinNormal.en: I never get involved in politics. You'd best be on your way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从不卷入政治，你最好继续走你的路。

yingyinNormal.en: Charles is fine with the CIA being involved. Isn't that right?
yingyinNormal.zh: 查尔斯同意中情局介入，对吗？

yingyinNormal.en: The same police that buried his DUI? And you think I was involved?
yingyinNormal.zh: 掩盖他醉驾的同一帮警察? 而你认为这事与我有关？

yingyinNormal.en: — "Thank you very much"? What did I do? — You got involved with her.
yingyinNormal.zh: —"太谢谢你了"？我做什么了？—你爱上她了。

yingyinNormal.en: Did she say she was involved with McGrath and the bombers? No. Never.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她有没有说她参与了麦格拉策划的爆炸袭击事件？没有。她没提过这个。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, sweetie, I'm not going to get involved in your relationship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 够了，亲爱的，我绝对不会干预你们的恋情。

yingyinNormal.en: That is not an option. There are other people involved, innocent people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个不能成立，这会卷入无辜的人。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I meant, has he ever been involved with someone who wasn't a brainiac?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是说，他有没有跟没那么大学问的女孩子谈过？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm... The things I've… Don't make us get security involved. Please. Just…
yingyinNormal.zh: 我，可是……别逼我们叫保安。求你了，就……

yingyinNormal.en: Tumor suppressor genes are involved in regulating how fast a cell divides.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肿瘤抑制基因参与控制细胞分裂速度。

yingyinNormal.en: D.A. suspects Mickey's involved. They want me to testify. I said I wouldn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地检官怀疑到米克身上，他们希望我能出庭作证，我没答应。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? I really don't want to get involved in your guys' relationship.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想要介入你们的关系当中。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, that makes it a class one felony for anyone involved in running the site.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那使得所有参与网站运营的人都可以定头等重罪。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, and when we're as big as Lockhart/Gardner. You don't need to get involved.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，等我们有洛&加那么强大的时候。你不必插手。

数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: If there is a role for government, it should really be getting <highlight>involved</highlight> in providing common goods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果政府要发挥作用，它真的应该参与提供公共产品。

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, there is something a little absurd in the state getting <highlight>involved</highlight> in the planning of such a fundamentally "grassroots" concept as community sports associations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实际上，国家把这样一个基本的“草根”概念作为社区体育协会来参与规划是有些荒唐的。

examination_example.sentence: This allows the TSA to focus on travelers who are higher risk, saving time for everyone <highlight>involved</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样，运输安全管理局可以重点关注那些更高风险乘客，从而节省所有相关人员的时间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: At this time, ReBicycle got <highlight>involved</highlight> and gave Leila a second-hand bicycle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此时，ReBicycle也参与进来，给了Leila一辆二手自行车。

examination_example.sentence: They need a little incentive to get <highlight>involved</highlight> in housework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们需要一点动力来参与家务。

examination_example.sentence: A couple of them have got <highlight>involved</highlight> in crimes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们中有几个人卷入了犯罪。

examination_example.sentence: Legal issues <highlight>involved</highlight> in commercial space exploration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商业太空探索中的法律问题。

examination_example.sentence: Most urban Africans work for a small minority of the rich, who tend to be <highlight>involved</highlight> in either cronyish (有裙带关系的) businesses or politics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数的非洲城镇居民为少数富人工作，而这些富人往往来自依靠裙带关系而发家的企业或在政界工作。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: What can we learn about people who are <highlight>involved</highlight> in artistic activities?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于参与艺术活动的人，我们能了解到什么？

examination_example.sentence: I didn't mind having a tense relationship with my brother because I was <highlight>involved</highlight> at school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不介意和我兄弟关系紧张，因为我在学校里也有参与。

examination_example.sentence: We all need to get <highlight>involved</highlight> in saving energy whether it's at work, at home, or at school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都需要参与到节约能源中来，无论是在工作中，在家里，还是在学校。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Thirdly, don’t be quick to get <highlight>involved</highlight> when your children make an improper choice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第三，当你的孩子做出不恰当的选择时，不要急于介入。

examination_example.sentence: Also,  you can tell him if he gets <highlight>involved</highlight> in a fight,  he may get hurt and be punished.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，你可以告诉他，如果他卷入了打架，他可能会受伤和受到惩罚。

examination_example.sentence: In the school,  everyone <highlight>involved</highlight>(卷入) in a fight will be punished,  no matter who started it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在学校里，每个卷入打架的人都会受到惩罚，不管是谁挑起的。
